#f3h #f3h2 #f3h_2 #f3h_2_demon #f3h2_demon #demon #us #usa #america #plane #collimator #sight #userskin #usersight #f8u #f8u2 #f8u_2 #crusader

Fixed portion sight replacement for the US F3H-2 Demon and F8U-2 Crusader jets. This will allow easier target acquisition as well as easier missile locking for AIM-9B's in sim.

Want this and over a hundred more in an all-in-one pack? Get it here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101224/en/

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder root directory and combining with any existing folder.
#girls_and_panzer #gup #girlsundpanzer #girls_und_panzer_der_film #wtdraw #anime

Texas from arknights.
Sexyl? Yeah, i know ))))))))))))))))))))
Sights with characters from this game are not so popular so I decided to support this topic

redacted-happy birthday to Texas (June 1st)
